column1: Local Foods////Absolutely love local foods! Their pretzel bun makes me want to drool at the thought of it. I ordered the chicken sandwich and side of chicken soup. The soup tasted fresh and well made. My friend ordered the Asian salad which was also very good. The one thing I didn't really care for was the side of kale salad
column2: only because they add cheese into the salad and it just doesn't go well together in my opinion. Other than that
column3: food is great here! Get the fresh chips too!
